title: Veil Systems Inc. Launches Kickstarter Campaign for Veiltower Production
text:
Veil Systems Inc., the creator of elegant smart products that provide protection from MiTM, phishing and malware attacks , has launched a Kickstarter campaign to raise funds for the production and distribution of Veiltower, its designer-placed anywhere-plug and play router .
"Currently, 40 million people have been the victim of some form of cybercrime," note Veiltower creators. "An always connected experience is convenient, but it comes with risks. Most people are ‘tech novices’ who are frustrated with the complexity of technology. As a result they are typically not very well protected. With Veiltower, you get a beautiful device that’s hassle-free while protecting you at home, on mobile networks and public hotspots."
Veiltower only needs a power outlet allowing it to be placed centrally in your home. As a result it offers excellent wireless coverage and blazingly fast speeds. Many hackers put out a stronger WiFi signal pretending to be network your device is looking for in order to lure users to share passwords and sensitive information. Veiltower protects against MiTM attacks, phishing and malware attacks. Users simply set up Veiltower using a smartphone app. The app instantly logs you on to your home WiFi, WiFi hotspots or Mobile network and the automatic VPN that’s part of the app takes care of the protection. The device also offers data compression which provides for a faster experience on congested networks as well as reducing your mobile bill. The embedded encryption also enforces net neutrality by creating a secure tunnel on mobile networks.
Veiltower is constructed with 11 antennas, a QCA 9990 WiFi chipset, 256 MB Ram memory, 128 MB Flash memory, 2X Gigabit LAN, 4X USB 3.0 and has a max link rate of 1.73 Gbps. Future evolutions will include the ability for developers and partners to create apps for Veiltower. The creators have listed a series of ideas to excite potential partners.
As seen at http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/veiltower/veiltower-where-connected-and-protected-converge , The Kickstarter campaign offers pledge levels from $25 to $599. Veiltower itself is available for as low as $159. For more information, see the Kickstarter page.
About Veiltower:
Veiltower is a hassle-free, yet advanced router with a distinctive design that you can put anywhere, giving you protection at home, on mobile networks and public hotspots. At home it offers excellent wireless coverage and blazingly fast speeds. It offers all connected devices protection against MiTM, phishing and malware attacks. Veiltower also has beautiful design that requires no networks cables. Simply place it anywhere you want and plug in power to get started. Now, the creator of this unique product has launched a Kickstarter campaign to raise production and distribution funds.
